Scene:
The Snowball
(Yuki kokashi / 雪転かし)

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Production: December 1976

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))
